old: The registered office of the Company is situated in Dubai International Financial Centre at: Office 567, Level 8, DIFC Building, Dubai, UAE.
new: The registered office of the Company is situated at: Office 123, Level 1, Al Sila Tower, ADGM Square, Al Maryah Island, Abu Dhabi, UAE.
reason: Registered office must be within ADGM for compliance.

old: To provide financial advisory services under UAE Federal jurisdiction
new: To provide financial advisory services under ADGM jurisdiction
reason: Company activities must be under ADGM jurisdiction for compliance.

old: The Company is incorporated under the UAE Commercial Companies Law and subject to UAE Federal Courts jurisdiction.
new: The Company is incorporated under ADGM Regulations 2020.
reason: Incorporation details must reflect ADGM regulations.

old: This Memorandum shall be governed by UAE Federal Law and disputes resolved in UAE Federal Courts.
new: This Memorandum shall be governed by the laws of Abu Dhabi Global Market and disputes resolved in ADGM Courts.
reason: Governing law and jurisdiction must be ADGM compliant.
